title: JSON formatting schema for the VSCode Liquid extension

variations.description: Format options or rules applied to a custom set of defined tags

variant.title: Tag name
variant.description: The name of the HTML or Liquid tag. Do not include delimeters or use expression syntax, accepts only a string value

output.title: Tag attribute
output.description: Define the tag by its attribute value. The extension will query select the defined tag and matching attribute property or value

name.title: Liquid Standard
name.description: The name of the base Liquid language grammard. All variations generated will extend upon this grammar.

variations.title: Variations
variations.description: Diagnostic/Linting validation to execute on Liquid syntax.
